title: Tepeköy Höyük
description: Settlement in eastern Turkey containing signs of inhabitation dated to the Early Bronze Age. Rescue excavations were conducted at the site prior to its inundation by the Alpaslan-2 Reservoir in 2021.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate centerpoint of the Tepeköy Höyük site prior to its inundation, after Erdoğan 2023.
properties.title: Google Earth location of Tepeköy Höyük
